metadata.title: CVE-2022-34305 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In Apache Tomcat 10.1.0-M1 to 10.1.0-M16, 10.0.0-M1 to 10.0.22, 9.0.30 to9.0.64 and 8.5.50 to 8.5.81 the Form authentication example in the examplesweb application displayed user provided data without filtering, exposing aXSS vulnerability.

criterions.comment: tomcat7 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
tomcat8 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
tomcat9 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
